title.0: FDA Approves New Treatment for Rare Disease
title.1: Major Pharma Company Announces Phase 3 Results

summary.0: The FDA has approved a new therapy for a rare genetic disease, marking a significant milestone in treatment options.
summary.1: A leading pharmaceutical company reported positive Phase 3 trial results for its flagship oncology drug.

content.0: The FDA has approved a new therapy for a rare genetic disease, marking a significant milestone in treatment options. The drug, developed over a decade, showed promising results in clinical trials.
content.1: A leading pharmaceutical company reported positive Phase 3 trial results for its flagship oncology drug. The results exceeded expectations with a 40% improvement in progression-free survival.
